project.title: Projects <emoji>üê£</emoji>
project.subtitle: Some of the projects I'm recently working on
project.portfolio: Developed a fully responsive website for myself, using Next.js 13 to build a blazingly fast, good accessibility and great SEO ranking website.
project.startupWeb: Developed a fully responsive website for a startup. The site has a CMS for client to manage website content and E-commerce shop for their sales.
project.mobileApp: A simple Pomodoro Timer app using Flutter. You can customize your study timer and choose from a variety of aesthetic themes.

thisSite.title: About this site<emoji>üåû</emoji>
thisSite.performance: Built on [Next.js 13](https://nextjs.org/) primitives like [Server Components](https://nextjs.org/docs/getting-started/react-essentials#server-components) for blazingly performance.
thisSite.accessibility: Use Accessible Name such as `aria-label` and `aria-hidden` to help Assistive Technologies
thisSite.seo: Implement components like [Metadata](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/metadata), [Sitemap](https://nextjs.org/learn/seo/crawling-and-indexing/xml-sitemaps), [OG](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/file-conventions/metadata/opengraph-image) and [Robot.txt](https://nextjs.org/learn/seo/crawling-and-indexing/robots-txt) to boost SEO ranking
